ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Prostate Cancer, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-PC-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Prostate Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast, Colorectal, Endometrial, Melanoma, Ovarian, and/or Prostate Cancer, NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BCEMOPCA-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Breast, Colorectal, Endometrial, Melanoma, Ovarian, and/or Prostate Cancer. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Prostate Cancer or Radiation-induced Toxicity in Prostate Cancer Patients
ConsentGroup.name: PC-RITPC
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to prostate cancer OR to radiation-induced toxicity in prostate cancer patients Cancer research uses must be specific to prostate cancer. General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (PUB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-PUB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Prostate Cancer Predisposition)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-PCP
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Prostate Cancer Predisposition.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Prostate Cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-PC
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Prostate Cancer.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical
ConsentGroup.name: HMB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, NPU, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-NPU-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.
Data is available for cancer research relating to population structure (including research that may have applications or implications for the understanding of ancestral history, because of the information it may provide about allele frequencies in different populations). Data is NOT available for genetic research on non-cancer and/or non-disease traits (e.g., intelligence, behavioral traits). Data is NOT available for general methods development research.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.

ConsentGroup.title: Men's Health and Nutrition in Serious Illnesses (MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: MHNSI-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to hypotheses about men's health relating nutritional factors to the incidence of serious illnesses, such as cancer, heart disease, and other vascular and neurological diseases. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Prostate Cancer, MDS, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-PC-MDS-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Prostate Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms). Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, MDS, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-MDS-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms). Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.

ConsentGroup.title: Cancer in all age groups, other diseases in adults only, and methods
ConsentGroup.name: CADM
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: The informed consent document signed by the study participants allows use of these data by investigators for discovery and hypothesis generation in the investigation of the genetic contributions to cancer in all age groups and other diseases in adults only, as well as development of novel analytical approaches for GWAS.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Prostate Cancer, PUB, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-PC-PUB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Prostate Cancer. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, Heart Disease, Stroke, Alzheimer Disease, and Diabetes, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CHDSAD-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cancer, Heart Disease, Stroke, Alzheimer Disease, and Diabetes. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Prostate Cancer, Methods, Non-control
ConsentGroup.name: PC-MDS-NOCTRL
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to prostate cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms). The data cannot be used as control data for other studies.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Chronic Diseases (including Cancer), Methods
ConsentGroup.name: CHRONIC
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited to epidemiological and medical research on chronic diseases (including cancer), including factors potentially related to risk and progress; method development research.

ConsentGroup.title: Epidemiological and Medical Research on Cancer, Methods
ConsentGroup.name: EPIMEDCA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited to epidemiological and medical research on cancer, including factors potentially related to risk and progress; method development research.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.
